content.description:
P-1 5.8+ 80' Face climb past the first 2 bolts and out right onto the ramp (awkward). A mix of bolts and gear ends at a cool belay.

P-2 5.9 80' Follow the bolt line to a ledge then onto a left angling ramp (crux), then really fun face edges to a small ledge anchor.

P-3 5.8 80' Go left on the ledge to some bolts and straight up to a grassy ledge. Move up past a bolt and into the roof (crux). Nice jams to the anchor. Rap the route. This anchor is just below the summit ridge.
content.protection: P1 & 3, single rack to 3", several bolts,Â  P-2 10 bolts
content.location: Approach from the Regalias and cross an uphill grassy slope 50' into a gully where the starting bolts are.

content.description: Jam a hand crack and exit onto a steep face with some large patina. Wild stemming, underclings and pinches past 3 bolts then eases for a bit. Step left onto the slab and hard 5.10 climbing to the anchor.
content.location: Starts off a wide ledge to the left of Sun's second pitch. You can belay from the cave anchor or at the starting crack with one bolt and gear. 90' lower back to the cave.
